snippet: Mr. Klugman had been set to play Juror No. 9 in the production, 55 years after he had a breakout performance in the 1957 film "12 Angry Men" as Juror No. 5.
abstract: Mr. Klugman had been set to play Juror No. 9 in the production, 55 years after he had a breakout performance in the 1957 film "12 Angry Men" as Juror No. 5.

headline.main: Health Reasons Force Klugman's Withdrawal From 'Twelve Angry Men'
headline.print_headline: Jack Klugman Withdraws From a Play, Citing Health
